action_title: Use an electric current to deter mammals from fishing gear
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of using an electric current to deter mammals from fishing gear. The study was in the Fraser River (Canada).

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
OTHER (1 STUDY)

Human-wildlife conflict (1 study): One controlled study in the Fraser RiverÂ found that using an electric current on a fishing net reduced Pacific harbour seal predation on salmon catches.
